text: So thoughts on Landing Pages and being added to the sitemap.xml file? as from what I am seeing LP's do not get added to the sitemap correct?
I mean technically, yea you wouldnt want them in there for things like "thank you" pages or campaign specific pages but maybe for some it might be needed. Thoughts?
aannnd looks like its a know issue: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Blog-Website-Page-Publishing/Adding-Landing-Page-to-Sitemap/td-p/211699>
my personal feelings on it - landing pages by default should not be indexed in the sitemap, but you should be able to opt them in
Agreed on that, def off by default, it looks like it might just be an issue without portal so i sent in a support ticket to see
